医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
PlaqueTec 在 BIOPATTERN 试验中招募了前 10 名患者PlaqueTec 是一家识别内型特异性生物标志物以推进冠状动脉疾病 (CAD) 精准医疗的公司，今天宣布，该公司已获得英国药品和保健品监管机构 (MHRA) 的批准，可在招募首批 10 名受试者后继续进行 BIOPATTERN 试验患有冠心病的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/PlaqueTec-recruits-first-ten-病人-in-BIOPATTERN-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/PlaqueTec-recruits-first-ten-病人-in-BIOPATTERN-Trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e09a178-c2b8-47e6-933c-ba083b3e125e Wed, 29 Nov 2023 10:21:00 -0500
使用 INTEGRA 移液器加速抗体治疗INTEGRA Biosciences 向英国初创公司 Creasallis 授予了 50 个 EVOLVE 手动移液器、价值 1000 美元的 GRIPTIPS® 移液器吸头以及各种实验室配件，帮助加速其在提高治疗性抗体对肿瘤的渗透性方面的开创性研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Accelerating-antibody-therapy-with-INTEGRA-pipettes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Accelerating-antibody-therapy-with-INTEGRA-pipettes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fe51e4f-7844-41ed-8a33-7a58129e8d6e Wed, 29 Nov 2023 10:13:00 -0500
怀孕期间的 COVID-19 与较高的早产风险有关；早期采用疫苗显示出保护作用孕产妇 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 感染对婴儿健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/COVID-19-in-pregnancy-tied-to-higher-preterm-birth-risk3b-early-vaccine-adoption-shows-protective-effect.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/COVID-19-in-pregnancy-tied-to-higher-preterm-birth-risk3b-early-vaccine-adoption-shows-protective-effect.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db2486fe-8814-4c77-84da-f6b9ec2365c1 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 08:47:00 -0500 COVID-19 in pregnancy tied to higher preterm birth risk; early vaccine adoption shows protective effect
研究人员将 CRISPR 介导的基因组和癌症粉碎作为治疗复发性神经胶质瘤的概念范例研究人员证明了成簇规则散布的短回文重复序列（CRISPR）介导的胶质母细胞瘤（GBM）细胞的消除。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Researchers-introduce-CRISPR-induced-genome-and-cancer-shredding-as-a-conceptual-paradigm-to-treat-recurrent-gliomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Researchers-introduce-CRISPR-induced-genome-and-cancer-shredding-as-a-conceptual-paradigm-to-treat-recurrent-gliomas.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=639d95e1-49b6-49ab-ac1f-9bddc6b04bd1 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 07:53:00 -0500 Researchers introduce CRISPR-mediated genome and cancer shredding as a conceptual paradigm to treat recurrent gliomas
研究揭示了影响我们食物选择的令人惊讶的发现食物的特征（例如成分）及其对食物奖励/偏好和喜好的贡献。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-reveals-surprising-findings-on-what-influences-our-food-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-reveals-surprising-findings-on-what-influences-our-food-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=536603c2-c8ba-43a6-b033-007d9d319b6d Wed, 29 Nov 2023 07:18:00 -0500 Study reveals surprising findings on what influences our food choices
研究人员开发了一种新的德国大流行预测早期预警模型德国大流行病的早期预警指标和趋势预测模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Researchers-develop-a-new-early-alert-model-for-pandemic-predictions-in-Germany.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Researchers-develop-a-new-early-alert-model-for-pandemic-predictions-in-Germany.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81febd25-5847-4d14-854c-03c290eadfd6 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 06:45:00 -0500 Researchers develop a new early alert model for pandemic predictions in Germany
研究显示，早晨的发型会让个人接触有害化学物质研究人员进行了真实型护发实验，以评估在住宅结构中使用护发产品 (HCP) 期间循环挥发性甲基硅氧烷 (cVMS) 的排放和暴露。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Morning-hair-routine-can-expose-individuals-to-harmful-chemicals-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Morning-hair-routine-can-expose-individuals-to-harmful-chemicals-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39aef5b1-3689-4b5d-a27f-2aca7989d294 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 06:44:00 -0500 Morning hair routine can expose individuals to harmful chemicals, study shows
长期使用多动症药物的人患心血管疾病的风险可能更高大部分开始服用多动症药物的患者，尤其是年轻人，会在第一年内停止服用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/People-using-ADHD-medicines-for-a-long-time-may-have-higher-risk-of-cardioangio-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/People-using-ADHD-medicines-for-a-long-time-may-have-higher-risk-of-cardioangio-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abcb69c9-c1ed-44b9-9ccc-ea2316044dc6 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 06:29:17 -0500 People using ADHD medicines for a long time may have higher risk of cardiovascular diseases
涂层纺织品可用作医院的抗菌窗帘医院细菌和病原体并不总是直接在人与人之间传播。它们还可以通过受细菌污染的表面和物体传播https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Coated-textiles-could-be-used-as-antimicrobial-curtains-in-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Coated-textiles-could-be-used-as-antimicrobial-curtains-in-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c11d4a2-3baa-4860-a536-62798704d775 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 06:16:18 -0500 Coated textiles could be used as antimicrobial curtains in hospitals
提供免费水果可以提高学生的学业成绩吗？为中小学混合学校的孩子提供水果是否可以提高学习成绩。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Does-providing-free-fruit-improve-students-academic-grades.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Does-providing-free-fruit-improve-students-academic-grades.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f91622d-e1c5-4dd2-b999-db8336864a52 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:55:00 -0500 Does providing free fruit improve students' academic grades?
